resources.string: MySports.ae is an online project under Smart Sports General Trading. Dubai aimed of creating an ultimate platform for Sports Lovers in the region by integrating services like Venue Booking, Sports Store, Events & Act as one stop online destination for all Sport's needs.

MySports.ae provides a user-friendly convenientonline platform for Booking indoor as well Outdoor courts, Buying Sports Gear and Accessories, participate in Sports Events organised in the Region..... We aim@ creating the Smartest Sports Experience in the Region

Mr.M.J. Mohanachnadran ia an Indian International Badminton Coach who has produced many National International Badminton players from kerala , a state in south India. He is an NIS(National Institute of Sports), the premier coaches & rsquo; training institute in Asia and has vast experience over 22 year in the feild of Badminton coaching.He is an NIS(National Institute of Sports), the premier coaches & rsquo; training institute in Asia and has vast experience over 22 year in the feild of Badminton coaching.Mr.M.J.
